contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox given name | name = Yoshimasa | image = | image_size = | caption = | pronunciation = | gender = Male | meaning = Different meanings depending on the [[kanji]] used | region = | language = | origin = Japanese | alternative spelling = | nickname = | variant forms = | related names = | name day = | derived = | popularity = | footnotes = }} '''Yoshimasa''' (written: 芳正, 義正, 義政, 義昌, 佳正, 慶昌 or 吉政) is a masculine Japanese given name. Notable people with the name include: *{{Nihongo|[[Ashikaga Yoshimasa]]|足利 義政}} (1435–1490), Japanese shogun *[[Yoshimasa Fujita]] (born 1979), Japanese footballer *{{Nihongo|[[Yoshimasa Hayashi]]|林 芳正}} (born 1961), Japanese politician *{{Nihongo|[[Heinouchi Yoshimasa]]|平内 吉政}}, Japanese woodworker *{{Nihongo|[[Yoshimasa Hiraike]]|平池 芳正}}, Japanese anime director *{{Nihongo|[[Yoshimasa Hosoya]]|細谷 佳正}} (born 1982), Japanese voice actor *{{Nihongo|[[Yoshimasa Ishibashi]]|石橋 義正}} (born 1968), Japanese artist *{{Nihongo|[[Kiso Yoshimasa]]|木曾 義昌}} (1540–1595), Japanese samurai *{{Nihongo|[[Yoshimasa Kondo]]|近藤 芳正}} (born 1961), Japanese actor *{{Nihongo|[[Ōshima Yoshimasa]]|大島 義昌}} (1850–1926), Japanese general *{{Nihongo|[[Yoshimasa Suda]]|須田 芳正}} (born 1967), Japanese footballer *{{Nihongo|[[Shishihō Yoshimasa]]|嗣子鵬 慶昌}} (1955–2006), Japanese sumo wrestler {{given name}} [[Category:Japanese masculine given names]]
